01_street.name: Inside a car
01_street.description: You are inside your car in the driver seat. The night is dark but you see a metal fence caught in your headlights.
01_street.search_light: You can see a lighter and a couple of coins on the shelf. You also notice a pack of cigarettes on a front seat.
01_street.search_dark: You can't see much inside a car since the lights are off. You see a couple of lights flickering on a dashboard.
